mods.abstract: Includes: Dubos, Rene J. Variations in antigenic properties of bacteria; Novel genotypes in mixed cultures of biochemical mutants of bacteria, by Joshua Lederberg and E. L. Tatum; Biochemical studies of environmental factors in transformation of pneumococcal types, by Maclyn McCarty, Harriet E. Taylor and O. T. Avery; Tatum, E. L. Induced Biochemical mutations in bacteria.
